author: inthedark.org
install_msg: Thanks for installing the mod manager cog.
name: FreeloaderMode
short: Force ban/kick users so that they stay in the ban/kick list even if someone tries to manually unban them.
description: Force ban/kick users so that they stay in the ban/kick list even if someone tries to manually unban them.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores end user ids as user data for banning/kicking users.
